content.rendered:
• Proven SEO experience – with Ahrefs, SEMRush, Ubersuggest, Keyword Planner, SEO Audit Tools, BrokenLinkChecker, Page Insight, Google Console, Crawl and Rank etc.
  • In-depth experience with website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends, VIDIQ)
  • Experience with Google Tag manager
  • Tracking PPC campaigns through UTM parameters, Re-targeting ads
  • Proven success of organic lead generation through guest blogging sites, other third party reputed websites
  • Proven result in solid marketing lead generation from SEO and SEM campaigns
  • Proven SEM experience in managing PPC campaigns across Google, Yahoo and Bing, Twitter, Insta, Facebook, LinkedIn.
  • Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints (optional)
